title: Dotdash Meredith (Now People inc.)
headline: Helping The Balance bring financial literacy to a new generation of users.
description: The Balance is a website focused on simplifying personal finance topics and news. The team is currently rebranding to refresh the existing identity and make the site more appealing to a younger generation of users. To kickstart this effort, I spearheaded the rebranding of the siteâ€™s advice column, My Two Cents.

blocks.content: BRANDAs the Balance was working towards a fresher, more bold brand identity, I kicked off their rebrand project by developing a sub-brand for My Two Cents.

EDITORIAL SYSTEM

Along with this rebrand, I developed a design system to allow editorial teams to rapidly generate recirculation images that differentiated MTC from other content on the site. You can see these images in action here.

SOCIALI developed a number of templates for My Two Cents to highlight its headlines and images.

I also adopted a social media strategy that emphasized content that could be natively shared within the app, as opposed to through a link in bio.
